actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to amend the International Organizations Immunities Act and title 28, United States Code, to restrict the jurisdictional immunity to which certain international organizations are entitled.

summary.text: Amends the Foreign Sovereign Immunities Act of 1976 to include within the definition of "foreign state" international organizations designated under the International Organizations Immunities Act (thereby applying certain exceptions to jurisdictional immunity to such organizations).

titles.title: A bill to amend the International Organizations Immunities Act and title 28, United States Code, to restrict the jurisdictional immunity to which certain international organizations are entitled.
